thread.section_title: Pod 39 Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cheap, clean, feels safe, great location
thread.title_full: Cheap, clean, feels safe, great location - Review of Pod 39 Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Johanna B
title: Cheap, clean, feels safe, great location
text:
This was my second stay. The staff is pleasant and it's small but well-designed. The coffee in Salvation Taco in the morning is excellent.
I wish the comforters were covered in clean sheets. I feel the room and shower could be a little cleaner. But other than that, this meets my needs and the mattress and pillows are comfortable. I feel safe traveling solo there. I will very likely return.
